email.description: Taikun email. Conflicts with: `keycloak_email`. Required with: `password`.

keycloak_email.description: Taikun Keycloak email. Conflicts with: `email`. Required with: `keycloak_password`.

keycloak_password.description: Taikun Keycloak password. Conflicts with: `password`. Required with: `keycloak_email`.

access_key_id.description: The AWS access key ID. Required for AWS.

availability_zone.description: The availability zone of the cloud credential. Optional for Openstack. Required for AWS and Azure. See `zone` for GCP.

access_scope.description: Who can use the kubeconfig: `personal` (only you), `managers` (managers only) or `all` (all users with access to this project).

content.description: Content of the kubeconfig's YAML file.

id.description: The kubeconfig's ID.

name.description: The kubeconfig's name.

user_id.description: ID of the kubeconfig's user, if the kubeconfig is personal.

validity_period.description: The kubeconfig's validity period in minutes. Unlimited (-1) by default. Defaults to `-1`.

bastion_proxy.description: Whether to expose the Service on each Node's IP at a static port, the NodePort. You'll be able to contact the NodePort Service, from outside the cluster, by requesting `<NodeIP>:<NodePort>`. Defaults to `false`.

cni.description: Container Network Interface (CNI) of the Kubernetes profile.

created_by.description: The creator of the Kubernetes profile.

id.description: The ID of the Kubernetes profile.

last_modified.description: Time and date of last modification.

last_modified_by.description: The last user to have modified the Kubernetes profile.

load_balancing_solution.description: The load-balancing solution: `None`, `Octavia` or `Taikun`. `Octavia` and `Taikun` are only available for OpenStack cloud. Defaults to `Octavia`.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the Kubernetes profile. Defaults to `false`.

name.description: The name of the Kubernetes profile.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the Kubernetes profile.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the Kubernetes profile.

schedule_on_master.description: When enabled, the workload will also run on master nodes (not recommended). Defaults to `false`.

unique_cluster_name.description: If not enabled, the cluster name will be cluster.local. Defaults to `true`.

discount_rate.description: Discount rate, must be between 0 and 100 (included). Defaults to `100`.

id.description: Organization's ID.

is_read_only.description: Whether the organization is in read-only mode.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the organization. Defaults to `false`.

managers_can_change_subscription.description: Allow subscription to be changed by managers. Defaults to `true`.

name.description: Organization's name.

discount_rate.description: Discount rate in percents (0-100 %). Defaults to `100`.

organization_id.description: ID of the organisation.

organization_name.description: Name of the organisation.

allowed_repos.description: Requires container images to begin with a string from the specified list.

forbid_http_ingress.description: Requires Ingress resources to be HTTPS only. Defaults to `false`.

forbid_node_port.description: Disallows all Services with type NodePort. Defaults to `false`.

forbidden_tags.description: Container images must have an image tag different from the ones in the list.

id.description: The ID of the Policy profile.

ingress_whitelist.description: List of allowed Ingress rule hosts.

is_default.description: Indicates whether the Policy Profile is the default one.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the Policy profile. Defaults to `false`.

name.description: The name of the Policy profile.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the Policy profile.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the Policy profile.

require_probe.description: Requires Pods to have readiness and liveness probes. Defaults to `false`.

unique_ingress.description: Requires all Ingress rule hosts to be unique. Defaults to `false`.

unique_service_selector.description: Whether services must have globally unique service selectors or not. Defaults to `false`.

access_ip.description: Public IP address of the bastion.

access_profile_id.description: ID of the project's access profile. Defaults to the default access profile of the project's organization.

alerting_profile_id.description: ID of the project's alerting profile.

alerting_profile_name.description: Name of the project's alerting profile.

auto_upgrade.description: If enabled, the Kubespray version will be automatically upgraded when a new version is available. Defaults to `false`.

backup_credential_id.description: ID of the backup credential. If unspecified, backups are disabled.

cloud_credential_id.description: ID of the cloud credential used to create the project's servers.

delete_on_expiration.description: If enabled, the project will be deleted on the expiration date and it will not be possible to recover it. Defaults to `false`. Required with: `expiration_date`.

expiration_date.description: Project's expiration date in the format: 'dd/mm/yyyy'.

flavors.description: List of flavors bound to the project.

id.description: Project ID.

images.description: List of images bound to the project.

kubernetes_profile_id.description: ID of the project's Kubernetes profile. Defaults to the default Kubernetes profile of the project's organization.

kubernetes_version.description: Kubernetes Version at project creation. Use the meta-argument `ignore_changes` to ignore future upgrades.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the project. Defaults to `false`.

name.description: Project name.

organization_id.description: ID of the organization which owns the project.

policy_profile_id.description: ID of the Policy profile. If unspecified, Gatekeeper is disabled.

quota_disk_size.description: Maximum disk size in GBs. Defaults to `102400`.

quota_ram_size.description: Maximum RAM size in GBs. Defaults to `102400`.

quota_vm_cpu_units.description: Maximum CPU units for standalone VMs. Defaults to `1000000`.

quota_vm_ram_size.description: Maximum RAM size in GBs for standalone VMs. Defaults to `102400`.

quota_vm_volume_size.description: Maximum volume size in GBs for standalone VMs. Defaults to `102400`.

router_id_end_range.description: Router ID end range (specify only if using OpenStack cloud credentials with Taikun Load Balancer enabled). Required with: `router_id_start_range`, `taikun_lb_flavor`.

router_id_start_range.description: Router ID start range (specify only if using OpenStack cloud credentials with Taikun Load Balancer enabled). Required with: `router_id_end_range`, `taikun_lb_flavor`.

taikun_lb_flavor.description: OpenStack flavor for the Taikun load balancer (specify only if using OpenStack cloud credentials with Taikun Load Balancer enabled). Required with: `router_id_end_range`, `router_id_start_range`.

created_by.description: The creator of the server.

disk_size.description: The server's disk size in GBs. Defaults to `30`.

id.description: ID of the server.

last_modified.description: The time and date of last modification.

last_modified_by.description: The last user to have modified the server.

name.description: Name of the server.

id.description: ID of the VM.

image_id.description: The VM's image ID (updating this field will recreate the VM).

last_modified.description: The time and date of last modification.

name.description: Name of the VM (updating this field will recreate the VM).

public_ip.description: Whether a public IP will be available (updating this field will recreate the VM if the project isn't hosted on OpenStack). Defaults to `false`.

standalone_profile_id.description: Standalone profile ID bound to the VM (updating this field will recreate the VM).

volume_size.description: The VM's volume size in GBs (updating this field will recreate the VM).

volume_type.description: Volume type (updating this field will recreate the VM).

device_name.description: Name of the device (required with AWS).

id.description: ID of the disk.

volume_type.description: Type of the volume (only valid with OpenStack).

block.description: Tags linked to the VM (updating this field will recreate the VM).

access_scope.description: Who can use the kubeconfig: `personal` (only you), `managers` (managers only) or `all` (all users with access to this project).

content.description: Content of the kubeconfig's YAML file.

id.description: The kubeconfig's ID.

name.description: The kubeconfig's name.

user_id.description: ID of the kubeconfig's user, if the kubeconfig is personal.

validity_period.description: The kubeconfig's validity period in minutes. Unlimited (-1) by default.

block.description: Retrieve a kubeconfig by its ID.

bastion_proxy.description: Whether to expose the Service on each Node's IP at a static port, the NodePort. You'll be able to contact the NodePort Service, from outside the cluster, by requesting `<NodeIP>:<NodePort>`.

cni.description: Container Network Interface (CNI) of the Kubernetes profile.

created_by.description: The creator of the Kubernetes profile.

id.description: The ID of the Kubernetes profile.

last_modified.description: Time and date of last modification.

last_modified_by.description: The last user to have modified the Kubernetes profile.

load_balancing_solution.description: The load-balancing solution: `None`, `Octavia` or `Taikun`. `Octavia` and `Taikun` are only available for OpenStack cloud.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the Kubernetes profile.

name.description: The name of the Kubernetes profile.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the Kubernetes profile.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the Kubernetes profile.

schedule_on_master.description: When enabled, the workload will also run on master nodes (not recommended).

unique_cluster_name.description: If not enabled, the cluster name will be cluster.local.

block.description: Get a Kubernetes profile by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.

discount_rate.description: Discount rate, must be between 0 and 100 (included).

id.description: Organization's ID.

is_read_only.description: Whether the organization is in read-only mode.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the organization.

managers_can_change_subscription.description: Allow subscription to be changed by managers.

name.description: Organization's name.

block.description: Get the details of an organization.

allowed_repos.description: Requires container images to begin with a string from the specified list.

forbid_http_ingress.description: Requires Ingress resources to be HTTPS only.

forbid_node_port.description: Disallows all Services with type NodePort.

forbidden_tags.description: Container images must have an image tag different from the ones in the list.

id.description: The ID of the Policy profile.

ingress_whitelist.description: List of allowed Ingress rule hosts.

is_default.description: Indicates whether the Policy Profile is the default one.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the Policy profile.

name.description: The name of the Policy profile.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the Policy profile.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the Policy profile.

require_probe.description: Requires Pods to have readiness and liveness probes.

unique_ingress.description: Requires all Ingress rule hosts to be unique.

unique_service_selector.description: Whether services must have globally unique service selectors or not.

block.description: Get a Policy profile by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.

access_ip.description: Public IP address of the bastion.

access_profile_id.description: ID of the project's access profile. Defaults to the default access profile of the project's organization.

alerting_profile_id.description: ID of the project's alerting profile.

alerting_profile_name.description: Name of the project's alerting profile.

auto_upgrade.description: If enabled, the Kubespray version will be automatically upgraded when a new version is available.

backup_credential_id.description: ID of the backup credential. If unspecified, backups are disabled.

cloud_credential_id.description: ID of the cloud credential used to create the project's servers.

delete_on_expiration.description: If enabled, the project will be deleted on the expiration date and it will not be possible to recover it.

expiration_date.description: Project's expiration date in the format: 'dd/mm/yyyy'.

flavors.description: List of flavors bound to the project.

id.description: Project ID.

images.description: List of images bound to the project.

kubernetes_profile_id.description: ID of the project's Kubernetes profile. Defaults to the default Kubernetes profile of the project's organization.

kubernetes_version.description: Kubernetes Version at project creation. Use the meta-argument `ignore_changes` to ignore future upgrades.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the project.

name.description: Project name.

organization_id.description: ID of the organization which owns the project.

policy_profile_id.description: ID of the Policy profile. If unspecified, Gatekeeper is disabled.

quota_vm_cpu_units.description: Maximum CPU units for standalone VMs.

quota_vm_ram_size.description: Maximum RAM size in GBs for standalone VMs.

quota_vm_volume_size.description: Maximum volume size in GBs for standalone VMs.

block.description: Retrieve a project by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.

created_by.description: The creator of the showback credential.

id.description: The ID of the showback credential.

last_modified.description: Time of last modification.

last_modified_by.description: The last user who modified the showback credential.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the showback credential.

name.description: The name of the showback credential.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the showback credential.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the showback credential.

password.description: The Prometheus password or other credential.

username.description: The Prometheus username or other credential.

block.description: Get a showback credential by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.

created_by.description: The creator of the showback rule.

global_alert_limit.description: Set limit of alerts for all projects.

id.description: The ID of the showback rule.

kind.description: The kind of showback rule: `General` (data source is Taikun) or `External` (data source is external, see `showback_credential_id`).

label.description: Labels linked to this showback rule.

last_modified.description: Time of last modification.

last_modified_by.description: The last user who modified the showback rule.

name.description: The name of the showback rule.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the showback rule.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the showback rule.

price.description: Billing in CZK per selected unit.

project_alert_limit.description: Set limit of alerts for one project.

type.description: The type of showback rule: `Count` (calculate package as unit) or `Sum` (calculate per quantity).

block.description: Get a showback rule by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.

id.description: The Slack configuration's ID.

name.description: The Slack configuration's name.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the Slack configuration.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the Slack configuration.

type.description: The type of notifications to receive: `Alert` (only alert-type notifications) or `General` (all notifications).

block.description: Get a Slack configuration by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.

id.description: The ID of the standalone profile.

lock.description: Indicates whether to lock the standalone profile.

name.description: The name of the standalone profile.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization which owns the standalone profile.

organization_name.description: The name of the organization which owns the standalone profile.

public_key.description: The public key of the standalone profile.

block.description: Get a standalone profile by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.

email_confirmed.description: Indicates whether the email of the user has been confirmed.

email_notification_enabled.description: Indicates whether the user has enabled notifications on their email.

id.description: The UUID of the user.

is_approved_by_partner.description: Indicates whether the user account is approved by its Partner. If it isn't, the user won't be able to login.

is_csm.description: Indicates whether the user is a Customer Success Manager.

is_disabled.description: Indicates whether the user is locked.

is_owner.description: Indicates whether the user is the Owner of their organization.

organization_id.description: The ID of the user's organization.

organization_name.description: The name of the user's organization.

role.description: The role of the user: `Manager` or `User`.

block.description: Get a user by its ID.

organization_id.description: Organization ID filter.
